name: In re ESTATE of Arthur N. BUSHNELL, Jr., Deceased. Appeal of the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Arthur N. BUSHNELL, Jr., Deceased. Appeal of the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Appellant to bear costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Catherine G. Barone, Asst. Atty. Gen., Michael von Moschzisker, Deputy Atty. Gen., Eastern Regional Director, Israel Packel, Atty. Gen., Philadelphia, attorneys for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellant.
Joseph F. Keener, Jr., Philadelphia, Brian E. Bennett, Mary R. Barr, Greenwell, Porter, Smaltz & Royal, Wayne, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
333 A.2d 916
In re ESTATE of Arthur N. BUSHNELL, Jr., Deceased. Appeal of the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 18, 1975.
Decided March 18, 1975.
Catherine G. Barone, Asst. Atty. Gen., Michael von Moschzisker, Deputy Atty. Gen., Eastern Regional Director, Israel Packel, Atty. Gen., Philadelphia, attorneys for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, appellant.
Joseph F. Keener, Jr., Philadelphia, Brian E. Bennett, Mary R. Barr, Greenwell, Porter, Smaltz & Royal, Wayne, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
